I am a second year Computer Engineering student at University of Waterloo. I'm working as full-stack developer and passionate about data science!
I am proficient in Java and c++ development and understand HTML, CSS, JavaScript and MySQL. As an engineering student, I am also passionate about hardware design and have experience in FPGA board, coding with VHDL and assembly.
